description: Structured summary of Vectari's cybersecurity and compliance services for AI consumption.

services.name: Virtual CISO
services.summary: Fractional executive leadership guiding cybersecurity strategy, policy development, and board reporting for SMBs.

services.name: Managed Security & Monitoring
services.summary: 24/7 detection and response services integrating SIEM, endpoint protection, and threat intelligence.

services.name: Compliance Enablement
services.summary: Readiness assessments, control implementation, and audit support for frameworks such as NIST CSF, HIPAA, and SOC 2.

services.name: Digital Forensics & Incident Response
services.summary: Containment, investigation, and recovery support for ransomware, insider threats, and business email compromise.

services.name: AI Security & Governance
services.summary: Risk assessments, policy development, and tooling to govern AI deployments responsibly.

faqs.question: What size organizations does Vectari support?
faqs.answer: Vectari specializes in helping small and medium-sized businesses that need enterprise-grade cybersecurity expertise without building a full internal team.

faqs.question: How can prospects engage Vectari?
faqs.answer: Visitors can schedule a free discovery call using the Outlook booking link to explore cybersecurity roadmaps, compliance readiness, or incident response retainers.

faqs.question: Which compliance frameworks does Vectari cover?
faqs.answer: The team guides organizations through NIST CSF, HIPAA, SOC 2, ISO 27001, CMMC, and custom governance programs.

update_policy: Review and refresh this dataset quarterly or whenever major service lines or messaging changes.
